thread.title: Suspect in Murder of T-Pain’s Niece Found Dead in Woods
thread.title_full: Suspect in Murder of T-Pain’s Niece Found Dead in Woods

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Suspect in Murder of T-Pain’s Niece Found Dead in Woods
text:
Jessica Bennett   
T-Pain is one of many celebrities who’ve grieved the murder of a family member, as his niece was killed last fall. 
It appears the number one suspect in her killing is now deceased as well, with suicide being the likely reason. 

23-year-old Jovana Glover was stabbed to death outside of the same Tallahassee Walgreens where she worked. 
Her ex-boyfriend, Tavon Jackson was the chief suspect in her murder. 

The 25-year-old’s body was found lifeless in the woods of Tallahassee on Tuesday (Feb 21), according to The NY Daily News. 
Police discovered the body while investigating an unrelated case. 
Credit: Tallahassee Police Department 
Upon initial investigation, authorities are calling Tavon’s death a suicide. 
They also believe he killed himself the same day he took Jovana’s life, as he was wearing the same clothing. 
Credit: Facebook 
Jovana’s mother, Jennifer Battles, has released a statement in regards to her daughter’s killer being found dead. 
“My family and I can begin the healing process in what has been an emotional roller coaster. I no longer have to worry about my granddaughter’s safety.” 

She continued, “I would like to thank the U.S. Marshals and the Tallahassee Police department. 
“They worked tirelessly to bring justice to my family. I would also like to thank my family and friends for keeping me sane in the midst of it all.” 

T-Pain shared his reaction to the murder of his niece last fall via Twitter, saying their family needs privacy and will stop at nothing to find her killer. Credit: Twitter 
Do you believe T-Pain will address this? Sound off below.
